page.title: 16KENWOOD HOUSE
page.content: My name is Pamela O Carroll. I live in Cricklewood NW9. One day my Mum and Dad decided to go somewhere nice, because it was a beautiful day. My family decided to go to{Hampstead {Heath.}We went by car and took a picnic. It took five or ten minutes to get there. We got out of the car and found somewhere to sit and play. We decided to sit near a house called { {Kenwood House. } In this house there are paintings, statues and other things. When we had looked round we went into the cafe and bought a lolly. Then we went back to our picnic and had someting to eat, and then went home.{ ({Kenwood House}was built in the 18th century for Lord Mansfield, in part by {Robert Adam. }In 1928 it was given to the nation by{Lord Iveagh}and is now a museum and art gallery. )
